UseGIFImageDecoder ().description: Enables the GIF image support for the CatchImage(), LoadImage(), CatchSprite() and LoadSprite() functions. Only LoadImage() and CatchImage() supports multi-frame GIF (it will result into a multi-frame image).

UseJPEG2000ImageDecoder ().description: Enables the JPEG 2000 support for CatchImage(), LoadImage(), CatchSprite() and LoadSprite()

UseJPEG2000ImageEncoder ().description: Enables the JPEG 2000 support for SaveImage() and SaveSprite()

UseJPEGImageDecoder ().description: Enables the JPEG support for CatchImage(), LoadImage(), CatchSprite() and LoadSprite()

UseJPEGImageEncoder ().description: Enables the JPEG support for SaveImage() and SaveSprite()

UsePNGImageDecoder ().description: Enables the PNG support for CatchImage(), LoadImage(), CatchSprite() and LoadSprite()

UsePNGImageEncoder ().description: Enables the PNG support for SaveImage() and SaveSprite()

UseTGAImageDecoder ().description: Enables the TGA support for CatchImage(), LoadImage(), CatchSprite() and LoadSprite()

UseTIFFImageDecoder ().description: Enables the TIFF support for CatchImage(), LoadImage(), CatchSprite() and LoadSprite()
